trans-unit.source: Provides the arguments for the <see cref="M:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.OnEventCommand(System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventCommandEventArgs)" /> callback.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce gli argomenti per il callback <see cref="M:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.OnEventCommand(System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventCommandEventArgs)" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the array of arguments for the callback.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la matrice di argomenti per il callback.

trans-unit.source: Gets the command for the callback.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il comando per il callback.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the event to disable.
Disables the event that have the specified identifier.
<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="eventId" /> is in range; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="eventId" /> è compreso nell'intervallo; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: You can turn off all events in an event listener by calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventCommandEventArgs.DisableEvent%2A> starting with `eventID` = 1 and continuing until <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventCommandEventArgs.DisableEvent%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: È possibile disattivare tutti gli eventi in un listener di eventi chiamando <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventCommandEventArgs.DisableEvent%2A> a partire da `eventID` = 1 e continuando fino al <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventCommandEventArgs.DisableEvent%2A> restituisce `false`.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the event to enable.
Enables the event that has the specified identifier.
<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="eventId" /> is in range; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="eventId" /> è compreso nell'intervallo; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: You can turn on all events in an event listener by calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventCommandEventArgs.EnableEvent%2A> starting with `eventID` = 1 and continuing until <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventCommandEventArgs.EnableEvent%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: È possibile attivare tutti gli eventi in un listener di eventi chiamando <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventCommandEventArgs.EnableEvent%2A> a partire da `eventID` = 1 e continuando fino al <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventCommandEventArgs.EnableEvent%2A> restituisce `false`.
